# fr-checkbox



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property             | Attribute           | Description             | Type      | Default     |
| -------------------- | ------------------- | ----------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `checked`            | `checked`           | Checked state           | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `disabled`           | `disabled`          | Disabled state          | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `hint`               | `hint`              | Hint text               | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `label` _(required)_ | `label`             | Checkbox label          | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `showToggleState`    | `show-toggle-state` | Show toggle state       | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `small`              | `small`             | Small size              | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `toggle`             | `toggle`            | Toggle                  | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `toggleLabelLeft`    | `toggle-label-left` | Toggle label align left | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `toggleSeparator`    | `toggle-separator`  | Toggle separator        | `boolean` | `false`     |


## Events

| Event    | Description                                | Type               |
| -------- | ------------------------------------------ | ------------------ |
| `change` | Emitted when the checked state has changed | `CustomEvent<any>` |


## Slots

| Slot       | Description                                        |
| ---------- | -------------------------------------------------- |
| `"native"` | Native input checkbox that contributes to the form |
